aws_cognito_user_pool.description: Provides a Cognito User Pool resource.

alias_attributes.description: Attributes supported as an alias for this user pool. Possible values: phone_number, email, or preferred_username. Conflicts with `username_attributes`.

auto_verified_attributes.description: The attributes to be auto-verified. Possible values: email, phone_number.

device_configuration.description: - The configuration for the [user pool's device tracking](#device-configuration).

name.description: The name of the user pool.

email_verification_subject.description: A string representing the email verification subject. Conflicts with `verification_message_template` configuration block `email_subject` argument.

email_verification_message.description: A string representing the email verification message. Conflicts with `verification_message_template` configuration block `email_message` argument.

lambda_config.description: - A container for the AWS [Lambda triggers](#lambda-configuration

password_policy.description: - A container for information about the [user pool password policy](#password-policy).

sms_authentication_message.description: A string representing the SMS authentication message. The message must contain the `{
